name: Slippy Fingers Melvin
description:
Poor Melvin keeps dropping his gun out of nerves and losing it in the sand. Lucky for him, he can always find a new one to keep fending off from Communist, Australian dinosaurs.

Created with Godot for the Global Game Jam 2021 - https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/slippy-fingers-melvin-8

external credits
